lead_paragraph: BERMAN--Hannah, passed away peacefully at the age of 98 on January 1, 2016; beloved wife of the late Dr. Martin H. Berman, loving mother of Judy and Paul Litner and Larry Berman, devoted grandmother of Barry and Jeffrey Stevens, adoring great-grandmother of Joshua and Carly Stevens, loving aunt of Barbara Harris, Janey Weinreb, Alan Feierstein and Susan Tornheim. She was loved by all who knew her and will be deeply missed. 1/3
